6.133. sibl_gui.globals.constants¶

constants.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines sIBL_GUI package default constants through the Constants class.

Others:

6.133.1. Classes¶

class sibl_gui.globals.constants.Constants[source]¶

This class provides sIBL_GUI package default constants.
